main: Except S3, skills {status:Discard} other skills to generate shield and set his {status:KnowledgeExplored}. Higher {status:KnowledgeExplored} increases shield generation on {status:Discard} and {status:Sinking} application on S2.
other: Defend trick can be used to maintain his {status:KnowledgeExplored}. Generate the defense skill and use the skill that wasn't replaced. This will stop skills from being discarded, but also prevent you from gaining the shields from discarding skills.

1010801.desc: When attacked, inflict 1 [Sinking] to the attacker (4 times max)
1010801.name: Sinking Knowledge

1010811.desc: When attacked, inflict 1 [Sinking] on the attacker. When attacked while Shielded, inflict 1 additional [Sinking] on the attacker. (4 times max)
1010811.name: Sinking Knowledge

1010821.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed Discards a Skill, gain (3 x Discarded Skill rank)% of the Max HP as Shield (Once per turn)
1010821.name: Reviewed Knowledge

1010831.desc: When 1 ally with the fastest Speed Discards a Skill, gain (5 x Discarded Skill rank)% of the Max HP as Shield (2 times per turn)
1010831.name: Reviewed Knowledge
